mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Jane Charlotte Blackburn Washington to Eliza Rankin, 1833 January 4
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Jane Charlotte Blackburn, 1786-1855
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Mount Vernon to her cousin. Encloses stock gilli seed ... will send Polianthus seeds and roots ... planning to board in Alexandria until late Mar ... sons at Howard School ... wants Maria to attend [Benjamin] Hallowell's school ... accepts offer of White fig and passion fruit ... will make every effort to keep up with MV without involving the children's estates ... Autograph letter signed, 2 pages, integral address panel and black wax seal.
